name: scratch-vernier-go-extensions
tagline: ScratchX extension for communicating with Vernier Go! devices
body:
### Introduction
Use data from Vernier [Go! Temp] (http://www.vernier.com/products/sensors/temperature-sensors/go-temp/) and [Go! Motion] (http://www.vernier.com/products/sensors/motion-detectors/go-mot/) sensors in your Scratch projects.

### Authors and Contributors
This page and the Go! Device extensions are maintained by Vernier Software & Technology (@ VernierSoftwareTechnology) Thanks to Kreg Hanning (@khanning) and the [Scratch Foundation] (http://www.scratchfoundation.org/) for their support, encouragement and for creating a fun and dynamic tool for teaching and learning.
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
